content.rendered:
Designer Androulla Toumazos and her mother Helene have been making clothes on Stoke Newington High Street for 32 years. I made this photofilm during their last week in their shop after they were evicted to make way for a supermarket.

See Stokey Local for more information about the campaign against the new Sainsbury’s development in the middle of Stoke Newington.
